headline: Trimble Streamlines Design Collaboration with 2025 Versions of Tekla Structural Design and Analysis Software
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) announced today the 2025 versions of Tekla® Structural Designer, its structural analysis and 3D design software for multimaterial buildings, and Tekla Tedds, its automated civil and structural analysis calculation software. With several significant updates, both products offer an enhanced user experience and expanded design capabilities for an optimized design collaboration experience.

content.title: Trimble Streamlines Design Collaboration with 2025 Versions of Tekla Structural Design and Analysis Software
content.summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) announced today the 2025 versions of Tekla® Structural Designer, its structural analysis and 3D design software for multimaterial buildings, and Tekla Tedds, its automated civil and structural analysis calculation software. With several significant updates, both products offer an enhanced user experience and expanded design capabilities for an optimized design collaboration experience.

thumbnail.caption: Tekla Structural Designer 2025: An improved workflow for the design of podium structures with masonry now include improvements for the design of reinforcement and the ability to model wall edge releases.

headline: Tekla PowerFab 2025 Version Transforms Collaborative Workflows for Steel Detailers and Fabricators
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today announced the 2025 version of its Tekla® PowerFab® steel fabrication management system. Offering improved workflow integration, renewed production scheduling and advance bill of materials (ABM) workflow enhancements, Tekla PowerFab helps streamline operations and provide a more connected and collaborative system for steel detailing and fabrication.

content.title: Tekla PowerFab 2025 Version Transforms Collaborative Workflows for Steel Detailers and Fabricators
content.summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today announced the 2025 version of its Tekla® PowerFab® steel fabrication management system. Offering improved workflow integration, renewed production scheduling and advance bill of materials (ABM) workflow enhancements, Tekla PowerFab helps streamline operations and provide a more connected and collaborative system for steel detailing and fabrication.

thumbnail.caption: Tekla Structures Connector: Seamless collaboration between the detailer and the fabricator: The new integration between Tekla Structures 2025 and Tekla PowerFab 2025 empowers you to easily share your profile catalog with detailers and validate their submittals instantly, resulting in error-free Bills of Materials and live exchange between Tekla Structures and Tekla PowerFab.

headline: Trimble Expands Connected Workflows in Tekla Structures 2025
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today introduced the 2025 version of Tekla® Structures, its flagship structural building information modeling (BIM) software. The new version introduces AI-enabled tools to enhance productivity and more efficient creation of fabrication drawings. New and enhanced features help to create, combine, manage and share information-rich 3D models for real-time, model-based collaboration throughout construction project stages.

content.title: Trimble Expands Connected Workflows in Tekla Structures 2025
content.summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today introduced the 2025 version of Tekla® Structures, its flagship structural building information modeling (BIM) software. The new version introduces AI-enabled tools to enhance productivity and more efficient creation of fabrication drawings. New and enhanced features help to create, combine, manage and share information-rich 3D models for real-time, model-based collaboration throughout construction project stages.

thumbnail.caption: Tekla Structures 2025: Enhanced communication between field and office. Streaming point cloud data using Trimble Reality Capture platform service frees up disk space and keeps Tekla Model Sharing project participants up to date. The renewed Layout Manager transfers data to and from Trimble Connect effortlessly to allow Trimble FieldLink to automatically use up to date files.
